definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: The interviewer asked the interviewees their opinions on the minimum wage.
sentences.chinese: 訪問員向受訪人查問他們對最低工資的意見。

sentences.english: Ive come to inquire about a five-thousand-pound remittance from London.
sentences.chinese: 我來查問一筆從倫敦匯來的五千英鎊匯款。

sentences.english: Hezekiah asked the priests and Levites about the heaps;
sentences.chinese: 希西家向祭司，利未人查問這堆壘。

sentences.english: Two people back home, Zhu Ma concerning things wrong.
sentences.chinese: 二人回家後，朱媽查問事情原委。

sentences.english: Then Hezekiah questioned with the priests and the Levites concerning the heaps.
sentences.chinese: 希西家向祭司，利未人查問這堆壘。

sentences.english: He was questioned by the police.
Go to check what time the celebration starts.
sentences.chinese: 去查問一下慶祝活動幾點鐘開始。

sentences.english: I enquired about trains to New York.
sentences.chinese: 我查問有關去紐約的火車開行情況。
打查號臺查問電話號碼。

sentences.english: I checked with my mega-rich friends to learn what pain they were expecting.
sentences.chinese: 我查問了我的鉅富的朋友們，瞭解他們等待什麼痛苦。

sentences.english: The police are interviewing two men in connection with the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在查問與劫案有關的兩個人。

sentences.english: He said some officers from Mong Kok police station are also being questioned.
sentences.chinese: 旺角警區部分警務人員亦被查問。

definition: to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
Mach (name)/Ernst Mach (1838-1916), German physicist/Mach number (fluid mechanics)
